mapper.sql: c.class_id, c.class_name, c.grade, c.major_id, c.teacher_id, c.status, c.create_by, c.create_time, c.update_by, c.update_time, u.user_name AS teacher_name, m.major_name AS major_name, (SELECT count(1) FROM edu_class_student cs WHERE cs.class_id = c.class_id) as student_count
mapper.select: SELECT FROM edu_class c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = c.teacher_id LEFT JOIN edu_major m ON m.major_id = c.major_id WHERE c.class_id = #{classId}

SELECT FROM edu_class c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = c.teacher_id LEFT JOIN edu_major m ON m.major_id = c.major_id JOIN edu_class_student cs ON cs.class_id = c.class_id WHERE cs.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_class (class_name, grade, major_id, teacher_id, status, create_by, create_time) VALUES (#{className}, #{grade}, #{majorId}, #{teacherId}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime})
